subject: Football
lead_paragraph: With little fanfare, Tony Dungy has joined the pantheon of top coaches. He may not invite the attention, but it is hard to imagine Dungy not being able to handle it considering what he has been through.
snippet: With little fanfare, Tony Dungy has joined the pantheon of top coaches. He may not invite the attention, but it is hard to imagine Dungy not being able to handle it considering what he has been through.
